Message:
Nebra stood captured
before me, a group of priests
holding knives up to her neck.

“So you’re Lucille, are you?
If you wish to spare her life,
throw down your blade!”

As I followed their orders
and threw down my blade,
the priest holding Nebra
released her.

I rushed to catch her,
and saw something
glint from behind me...

Frantically lunging to pull
Nebra out of harm’s way,
I felt something hot
sear into my back.

Hiding my wound from her view,
I grasped Nebra’s hand and ran.

I need to at least make sure...
Nebra escapes...!

...! Up ahead is the lake...!
At this rate, we’ll...!

“Now, this world will also rot
at the hands of the Curse...”

The priest let out
a demonic laugh,
before shoving us both
down into the lake below.
